content: I don't have personal opinions, but i can provide some general advice. the focus of an mlm business is to sell products and build a team of like-minded individuals who can sell the products as well. the two aspects of selling products and recruiting new people to join the mlm are complementary, and therefore, both are essential in building a successful mlm business. selling products is the foundation of any mlm business. you can build a customer base by promoting the quality, benefits, and features of your products. the more customers you have, the more sales you will make, and therefore the more successful your mlm business will be. recruiting new people is also crucial for an mlm business because your team members can help you reach a more extensive customer base and generate more sales. however, it's essential to focus on recruiting the right people who share your values, enthusiasm, and commitment to building a successful business. in conclusion, both selling products and recruiting new people are essential aspects of building a successful mlm business. it's important to strike a balance between the two and focus on building a strong customer base while simultaneously recruiting new team members to help you grow your business.
